类 Rook

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Piece>

    public class Rook
extends Piece
    Represents a Rook. This class overrides certain methods in Piece.
    作者:
    liueri19

    • 方法详细资料

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        从类复制的说明: Piece
        Returns a String representation of this Piece object.

        The subclasses are represented as:
        Pawn - P
        Rook - R
        Bishop - B
        Knight - N
        Queen - Q
        King - K

        The colors are represented as:
        Black - B
        White - W

        A Piece will be formated as:
        [color][type]
        A white Knight would be represented as WN, a black King would be represented as BK.

        指定者:
        toString 在类中 Piece
        返回:
        a String representation of this Piece object
